TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfoX509Data extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: Represents an subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption element.

span.span: Represents an subelement of an XMLDSIG or XML Encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表``包含 X.509v3 憑證的資訊項目相關的驗證或加密金鑰。The class represents the `` element that contains X.509v3 certificate information related to the validation or encryption key. 比方說，``項目可能包含 X.509 憑證的主體公開金鑰是驗證索引鍵或終止的憑證驗證的金鑰或其他識別項相關的 X.509 憑證的 X.509 憑證鏈結。For example, an `` element might contain an X.509 certificate whose subject public key is the validation key, or a chain of X.509 certificates that terminate in a certificate for the validating key, or other identifiers for related X.509 certificates. 使用類別，每當您需要包含 X.509 憑證資料加密或簽署 XML 文件。Use the class whenever you need to include X.509 certificate data in an encrypted or signed XML document. 如需詳細資訊``項目，請參閱第 4.4.4 節 XMLDSIG 規格，也就是可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)，或請參閱 XML 加密規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。For more information about the `` element, see Section 4.4.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何登入使用卸離的簽章的 XML 檔案。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 第二個範例示範如何登入使用包裹簽章的 XML 檔案。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. **範例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CPP/examplecreatedetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CS/examplecreatedetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/VB/examplecreatedetached.vb#1)] **範例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CPP/examplecreateenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CS/examplecreateenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/VB/examplecreateenvelope.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何登入使用卸離的簽章的 XML 檔案。The first example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using a detached signature. 第二個範例示範如何登入使用包裹簽章的 XML 檔案。The second example demonstrates how to sign an XML file using an envelope signature. **範例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CPP/examplecreatedetached.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/CS/examplecreatedetached.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Detached/VB/examplecreatedetached.vb#2)] **範例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CPP/examplecreateenvelope.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/CS/examplecreateenvelope.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.KeyInfoX509Data_Envelope/VB/examplecreateenvelope.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行識別，每個 X.509v3 憑證會攜帶發出搭配唯一的序號指派給憑證授權單位憑證的憑證授權單位名稱。For identification, each X.509v3 certificate carries the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate paired with a unique serial number assigned by the certification authority. 方法會將簽發者名稱和序號配對的相關資訊加入至清單物件，可透過存取屬性。The method adds information about an issuer name and serial number pair to a list of objects that are accessible through the property.

value.span: 一份結構，代表簽發者名稱和序號配對。

span.span: A list of structures that represent an issuer name and serial number pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表` 元素的 XML 數位簽章使用一份內包含的結構。The property represents the ` element of an XML digital signature using a list of structures contained within. ` 項目代表簽發者名稱和序號配對，可識別特定的 X.509v3 憑證。The ` element represents an issuer name and serial number pair, which identify a specific X.509v3 certificate. X.509 憑證的簽發者是發行憑證的憑證授權單位的名稱。The issuer of an X.509 certificate is the name of the certification authority that issued the certificate. 憑證授權單位指派每個發出唯一的序號的憑證。Certification authorities assign each certificate they issue a unique serial number. 您可以新增名稱和序號配對使用方法。You can add a name and serial number pair using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主體金鑰識別元 (Ski) 會識別包含特定公開金鑰憑證的方式。Subject key identifiers (SKIs) are a way to identify certificates that contain a certain public key. SKI 可用來識別發行給特定主題的金鑰組的一或多個憑證。An SKI can be used to identify one or more certificates issued to a particular subject key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個 X.509v3 憑證包含主體名稱。Every X.509v3 certificate includes a subject name. 此名稱可用來識別一個或多個憑證。This name can be used to identify one or more certificates.
